snippet.title: Echoes of the Fey: The Immolation 2019 Trailer
snippet.description:
Episode 0: The Immolation is a free, standalone chapter in the Echoes of the Fey adventure game/visual novel series.
Available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/585990/Echoes_of_the_Fey_Episode_0_The_Immolation/ 

Two years after its initial release, The Immolation is getting a makeover with new character sprites, improved special effects, and more!
